content.query:
SELECT TOP 10
    JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.CRMID') AS CRMID
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.LAST_NAME') AS LAST_NAME
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.FIRST_NAME') AS FIRST_NAME
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.MIDDLE_NAME') AS MIDDLE_NAME
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.ADMIT_TERM') AS ADMIT_TERM
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.ADMIT_DESCR') AS ADMIT_DESCR
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.ACAD_CAREER') AS ACAD_CAREER
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.ADMIT_TYPE') AS ADMIT_TYPE
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.ADMIT_TYPE_DESCR') AS ADMIT_TYPE_DESCR
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.APPL_SOURCE') AS APPL_SOURCE
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.ACAD_PROG') AS ACAD_PROG
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.ACAD_PROG_DESCR') AS ACAD_PROG_DESCR
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.ACAD_PLAN') AS ACAD_PLAN
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.ACAD_PLAN_DESCR') AS ACAD_PLAN_DESCR
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.CURRENT_PROGRAM') AS CURRENT_PROGRAM
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.CURRENT_PROGRAM_DESCR') AS CURRENT_PROGRAM_DESCR
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.CURRENT_PLAN') AS CURRENT_PLAN
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.CURRENT_PLAN_DESCR') AS CURRENT_PLAN_DESCR
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.GENDER') AS GENDER
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.AGE_BY_YEARS') AS AGE_BY_YEARS
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.ADDRESS1') AS ADDRESS1
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.ADDRESS2') AS ADDRESS2
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.CITY') AS CITY
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.STATE') AS STATE
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.POSTAL') AS POSTAL
    ,JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.StudentSK') AS StudentSK
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://edupocdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/student/student.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '},'
    )
    WITH (
        line varchar(max)
    ) AS [result]
ORDER BY
CAST(JSON_VALUE(LINE, '$.StudentSK') AS int)
